extensionDescription.message: Synchronize and share right answers to Moodle quizzes.

serviceUnreachableContent.message:
Failed to check SyncShare service status.

Possible reasons:
– Your Internet connection is too slow;
– The SyncShare service is currently in high demand;
– Your Internet Service Provider is blocking access to the SyncShare service;
– SyncShare service is currently under maintenance;
– We've screwed up somewhere - we'll fix it someday ;)

What can you do?
– Try to reload the page to check the status again;
– Try to use a proxy-server or VPN;
– There are no more options – you have to wait and hope.

P.S. The project is developed by enthusiasts in their spare time and is funded by personal funds and donations. If you like this extension, and you want to support the further work and development of the project, you can do it here, as well as in the settings menu.

highDemandContent.message:
The SyncShare services are currently experiencing a heavy load, which may cause the extension to not work partially. Thank you for your understanding.

P.S. Unfortunately, we cannot afford to scale the SyncShare infrastructure due to lack of funding. However, if you like this extension and want to support further work and development of the project, you can do it here or by clicking on the button below, as well as in the settings menu.

maintenanceContent.message: Maintenance work to improve SyncShare services is currently underway. The extension may not work for some time. Thank you for your understanding.

updateAvailableContent.message: Please be advised that a new version of SyncShare is available. For some reason your browser has not installed the update automatically. We recommend doing the update manually, as the current version will soon stop working.

installContent.message:
Hi!

Thank you for installing our web extension. To learn about all the features of SyncShare, we highly recommend that you read the documentation at the link.

P.S. A link to the documentation is always available in the settings menu.

parallelAttemptsContent.message:
Internal SyncShare state tell us that you are trying to solve several quizzes at the same time. We highly recommend that you do not do this as it will cause SyncShare to not work properly.

Thank you for your understanding.

P.S. If you think that this message has appeared in error, please report it to the address listed in the settings menu.

headHuntContent.message: Hi! If you are good with JavaScript and Node.js and want to improve SyncShare in any way, we are inviting you to join us. Contact us 👉 syncshare.ext@gmail.com 👈
